ygData.subject: Gladiator Scenario Editor
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I have a problem with the scenario editor, after I finish my map, I save it, go to play it, but the objects are never saved, so I can t fight anything

Hello, I have a problem with the scenario editor, after I finish my 
map, I save it, go to play it, but the objects are never saved, so I 
can't fight anything and I just automatically win.  I currently have 
version 3.8, is there a newer version out?  Thanks for the help.
